description.value: The sundaflora stands tall on its hind legs and begins to wave and dance, showing off its dazzling beauty to distract your attackers. It attempts to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.QNAVeNKtHA0EUw4X]{Feint} the target creature, using its [[/act feint skill=performance]]{Performance } skill instead of Deception. If successful (or critically successful), the target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Off-Guard} to you, rather than to your sundaflora.

publication.title: Pathfinder Lost Omens: Tian Xia Character Guide
